Ragdya (The Sage on the Mountain) [N]

Edicts Seek enlightenment through worldly experience, create humor in life, use harmless pranks to teach others

Anathema Make a joke out of someone's suffering, own a slave, discriminate based on social status

Follower Alignments NG, LN, N, CN

Devotee Benefits

Divine Ability Dexterity or Wisdom
Divine Font heal
Divine Skill Acrobatics
Favored Weapon mace
Domains air, confidence, might, perfection
Cleric Spells 1st: shockwave, 3rd: abyssal plague (mad monkeys), 4th: gaseous form
name: Ragdya
